game.name: Money Simulator
game.shortDescription: Hustle to the top through jobs, deliveries, street races, gambling, and risky crypto plays. Buy, upgrade, and flip cars and motorcycles for profit. Build your empire by launching businesses, managing operations, and hiring staff. Take bold risks, make big moves, and rise!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hustle to the top through jobs, deliveries, street races, gambling, and risky crypto plays. Buy, upgrade, and flip cars and motorcycles for profit. Build your empire by launching businesses, managing operations, and hiring staff. Take bold risks, make big moves, and rise!
